div.div: Map of future potential habitat (FPH) of Mussismilia harttii in two scenarios of greenhouse gas emissions (RCP 4.5 and RCP 8.5) in the year 2100.
div.p: The map includes the area of study ( G'), area ( M), the FPH in the two future scenarios in the entire study area ( G') and the area lost in relation to CPH.
